tool.name: Gate Finder
tool.description: displays a series of gating outcomes using Vitessce

param.name: masks
param.label: Select masks for the OME Tiff image (Optional)

param.name: anndata
param.label: Select the anndata containing marker intensities

param.name: marker
param.label: Marker for which gate is to be defined

param.name: to_gate
param.label: End value of the gate of interest.

param.name: increment
param.label: Increments between the start and end values

param.name: x_coordinate
param.label: X axis coordinate column name in AnnData object

param.name: y_coordinate
param.label: X axis coordinate column name in AnnData object

tool.help:
**What it does**
**Input**
OME-TIFF image. Segmentation masks (optional). AnnData with marker intensities.
**Output**
An HTML file with Vitessce component.
